"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c9d8636368720f5e8e0200#post_53c9d8636368720f5e8e0200
!http://images.wikia.com/touhou/images/8/85/FlandreKyun.png!

Joking aside if you're ever interested in "what the fuck is a touhou?" there's a fan doujin anime called fantasy kaleidoscope; I'm not going to lie skip episode 1 the ending was meh.  "Episode 2":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqM5hjcf48E "Episode 3":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KEff2L_ry5k  The first few minutes are confusing for new comers in that there's a lot of characters you don't know about, but it was pretty much a "here's the characters you like that doesn't have anything to do with the actual story of the episode" and the intro song was more of a pv than anything moment, but unlike other anime it does actually explain a lot of the questions.
